english.segment1: I know what it feels like to wish the day was. over, I know what it feels like to have. to start all over, I know what it feels like to. miss the punch like. While another. moment's passed me by
english.segment2: Don't try to phone, I'm not at home, I've left. And I'm never coming back, yeah-e-ah, Don't. try to page me, I'm not waiting, My mother. taught me that, yeah-e-ah
english.segment3: When I feel down and out, and there's no. one else around, There you are by my side, always waiting, waiting Come take my hand. and let's ride, 'til the morning meets The. night, I'll be patiently waiting
english.segment4: I know what it feels like to have to say. you're sorry, I know what it feels like to be. misunderstood, I know what it feels like to. thank the ones before me, Not a moment I. don't try
english.segment5: When I feel down and out, and there's no. one else around, There you are by my side. always waiting, waiting Come take my hand. and let's ride, 'til the morning meets The. night, I'll be patiently waiting
english.segment6: I'll be patient, I'll be patient, I'll be patiently waiting.
